history.proof: intros m H1 H2. unfold planar. apply eq_sym. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap H1 : inv_hmap m H2 : plf m Unable to unify "ec ?M2269 / 2 = nc ?M2269" with "0 = genus m".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> plf m -> planar m

Premises:
plf = fix plf (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 _ _ _ => plf m0 | L m0 zero x y => plf m0 /\ (~ eqc m0 x y \/ expf m0 (cA_1 m0 one x) y) | L m0 one x y => plf m0 /\ (~ eqc m0 x y \/ expf m0 x (cA m0 zero y)) end : fmap -> Prop
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
planar = fun m : fmap => genus m = 0 : fmap -> Prop
Euler_Poincare : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> planar m -> ec m / 2 = nc m
not_exd_nil : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m nil
expf_planar_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m one x y -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar (L m one x y)
expf_planar_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m zero x y -> expf m (cA_1 m one x) y -> planar (L m zero x y)
planar_I : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart) (t : tag) (p : point), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_I m x -> planar (I m x t p)
not_eqc_planar : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m k x y -> ~ eqc m x y -> planar (L m k x y)
planar_dec : forall m : fmap, {planar m} + {~ planar m}
surj_cF_1 : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> surj_dart (exd m) (cF_1 m)
nd_card : forall m : fmap, ndN m = card (fmap_to_set m)
MA0.orb_impls_expo : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> impls (MA0.Iter_orb m x) (MA0.Iter_orb m y) -> MA0.expo m x y
MF.exds_orb_exd : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exds (MF.Iter_orb m x) z -> exd m z
MA0.exds_orb_exd : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exds (MA0.Iter_orb m x) z -> exd m z
MA0.expo_eq_eqs_orb : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> MA0.expo m x y < -> eqs (MA0.Iter_orb m x) (MA0.Iter_orb m y)
succf_exd : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succf m z -> exd m z
MA0.f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> McA0.f_1 m (McA0.f m z) = z
McF.f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cF_1 m (cF m z) = z
MF.upb_eq_degree : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MF.Iter_upb m z = MF.degree m z
cF_1_cF : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cF_1 m (cF m z) = z
top_top_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ pred m k y -> top m k x = top m k y -> bottom m k x = y
bottom_bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ succ m k y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = y
exd_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (bottom m k z)
exd_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (top m k z)
exd_cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (cA m k z) /\ exd m (cA_1 m k z)
A_1_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A_1 m k x = y -> cA_1 m k x = y
top_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k (bottom m k z) = z
cA_1_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> cA_1 m k z = top m k z
bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k (top m k z) = z
pred_exd_A_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> exd m (A_1 m k z)
succ_exd_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m (A m k z)
eqc_cA_r : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> eqc m x (cA m k x)
MA0.eqs_orb : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> MA0.expo m x y -> eqs (MA0.Iter_orb m x) (MA0.Iter_orb m y)
nopred_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k z = z
nosucc_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k z = z
not_pred_B_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ pred m k z -> B_1 m k z = m
cA_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (top m k z) = bottom m k z
top_bottom_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> top m k (bottom m k z) = top m k z
bottom_top_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> bottom m k (top m k z) = bottom m k z
MF.modulo : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), dart -> inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> nat
MA0.incls_orbit : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> incls (MA0.Iter_orb m x) (fmap_to_set m)
expf_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> MF.expo m x y -> eqc m x y
